info.title: Read grouping information of a grouped, partially checked checkbox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first checkbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('[role="checkbox"]').focus();

user: When focus is on the first checkbox, read its grouping information.
instructions.raw: When focus is on the first checkbox, read its grouping information.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.
